channel.title: [RELEASE] Roatpkz remake [SOF/Customs/pvparmour]
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=4]RoatPkz remake[/SIZE]
Direct download:
[url=http://get420pics.com/source+client.rar]http://get420pics.com/source+client.rar[/url]
What will you receive in the download package?
[ul][*]Source [*]Client [*]Cache[/ul]
AV scan:
[IMG]http://static.afbeeldinguploaden.nl/1212/24215/90gKFM.png[/img]
Video:
[VIDEO]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UBUFdb1nTIQ[/VIDEO]
Features:
[ul][*]Improved PK system [*]Working Turmoil (not 100%) [*]Killstreak system [*]Spawn Tab [*]Squal of fortune, Spin modes: Pkpoints/items [*]new gfx+anims [*]Runixpkz Champ [*]New Gameframe(back to the old one) [*]Updated Items on Death function [*]80% Server Stability [*]Custom Items Added [*]New Interfaces [*]Login Interface [*]Fixed almost ALL Mem Leaks [*]Near Flawless Combat System [*]Very accurate Special Calc [*]Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP [*]NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED [*]Working Spirit Shield Effects [*]Vote4Cash Integrated [*]PERFECT Bridding / Switching [*]PKP Shops [*]Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! [*]Dragonfireshield working Charging! [*]FULLY working Overloads [*]Danger timer [*]Ticket System[/ul]
[IMG]http://static.afbeeldinguploaden.nl/1210/21418/UgsCQy.png[/img]
